ygData.subject: RE: Glowing Black Stone
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, I would say that you either killed a green mob with your pet or it was actually your pet that died.  You get no experience from a charmed mob s death.  I
ygData.messageBody:
Well, I would say that you either killed a green mob with your pet or it was
actually your pet that died. You get no experience from a charmed mob's
death. I can't recall any times when my pet killed a blue or better than I
did not get any exp from it.

Chiming
20th Enchantress on Fennin Ro

> From: "Amy Pratt" <sfpratt@...>
>
> Could one of you guys take the time please to explain how xp and charmed
> critters relates?
> I made level 12 today, and I was playing around with charm. I
> noticed that
> a lot of the time, I didn't get any xp when my pet's target died. What's
> happening?
>
> Caelrie, enchanter on Fennin Ro.
